# MusicDataRequest.Error.Source

**Enumeration**

A representation of the source of an error from Apple Music API.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Source
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **MusicDataRequest.Error.Source.parameter(_:)**: The URI query parameter that causes the error.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
